name: Thorned Seedpod
summary: When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines.
description:
When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines. When you critically succeed at a seedpod Strike, vines twist and stab your foe, dealing 1d4 persistent piercing damage.Traits

Leshy: Leshies are living plants animated by primal magic.
